title.native: ドメスティックな彼女

description:
Natsuo Fuji has a serious crush on one of his teachers, Hina Tachibana, but since he knows he has zero chance of ever being in a relationship with her, he lets his friends talk him into going to a party where he meets Rui. One thing leads to another and then, well, neither of them is a virgin anymore. Unfortunately, it wasn't what they expected, but that's fine. They're just ships passing in the night and they'll never have to see each other again, right? Except when Natsuo's father announces that he's getting married again, Natsuo discovers that he's getting two new step-sisters as well. Now there's a problem, because one is his teacher, Hina, and the other is Rui.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: บทเรียนรักเส้นทางหัวใจ

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Netorare
tags.description: Netorare is what happens when the protagonist gets their partner stolen from them by someone else. It is a sexual fetish designed to cause sexual jealousy by way of having the partner indulge in sexual activity with someone other than the protagonist.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:
Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mtocoda/)

He worked as a music composer for Capcom after graduating from the Kunitachi College of Music. He left the company in 2003 and founded Design Wave in 2007, and is still working as a composer for video games.  He is known for his work on the Devil May Cry and Monster Hunter series.

__Label:__ Warner Music Japan (since June 2020)
__Office:__ Victor Entertainment
__Genre:__ J-pop, Pop-Rock, Rock
__Instruments:__ Vocal, Guitar

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2JzylaIF8qeowc7-5VwwmA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/373STAFF/) | [Official Website](https://osakana373.therestaurant.jp/) | [Wikipedia (EN)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minami_(singer)) | [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E6%B3%A2_(%E3%82%B7%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AC%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BD%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC))

In 2017, she released the first mini album "Emotional Water" and the first single "main actor". It was sold exclusively at Tower Records in Shibuya, Sapporo, Sendai, Nagoya, Osaka, Hiroshima and Fukuoka. In the same year, on August 24, she held her first live at the Shibuya Eggman, titled "Emotional Water ~ my teen finale ~," as she realized her dream of hosting a solo concert in her teens.

In January 2019, she officially debuted featuring her first single "Kawaki wo Ameku", which was used as the opening theme for winter anime "Domestic na Kanojo". Later that year, on spring, with the name "Kawakioameku", she toured for the first time since her debut.

__Label:__ Warner Music Japan (since June 2020)
__Office:__ Victor Entertainment
__Genre:__ J-pop, Pop-Rock, Rock
__Instruments:__ Vocal, Guitar

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2JzylaIF8qeowc7-5VwwmA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/373STAFF/) | [Official Website](https://osakana373.therestaurant.jp/) | [Wikipedia (EN)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minami_(singer)) | [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E6%B3%A2_(%E3%82%B7%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AC%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BD%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC))

In 2017, she released the first mini album "Emotional Water" and the first single "main actor". It was sold exclusively at Tower Records in Shibuya, Sapporo, Sendai, Nagoya, Osaka, Hiroshima and Fukuoka. In the same year, on August 24, she held her first live at the Shibuya Eggman, titled "Emotional Water ~ my teen finale ~," as she realized her dream of hosting a solo concert in her teens.

In January 2019, she officially debuted featuring her first single "Kawaki wo Ameku", which was used as the opening theme for winter anime "Domestic na Kanojo". Later that year, on spring, with the name "Kawakioameku", she toured for the first time since her debut.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

Wataru is a light novel writer who is best known for being the author of [Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.](https://anilist.co/manga/70171/Yahari-Ore-no-Seishun-Love-Comedy-wa-Machigatteiru/) In March of 2009, he graduated from Meiji University in Communication and Information.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/toshi_ikebukuro)

Ou Jackson is an adult game scenario writer from Japan. He currently works for Navel.

John Ledford is an entrepreneur and leader in the North American anime industry. In 1992, he founded A.D. Vision (ADV), paving the way for other businesses and the exponential growth anime has had within North America. With ADV's success, Ledford turned his sights to making the imaginative world of anime even more accessible with Anime Network's founding, North America’s first cable TV network dedicated to anime. He later partnered with Kadokawa Publishing and began Newtype USA with translated Japanese content and exclusive U.S. material related to all things anime, manga, and model reviews. This endeavor expanded into ADV Manga, which obtained licensing and publishing rights for hundreds of Japanese manga and Korean manhwa.

In 2008, Ledford founded a new anime-focused company called Sentai Filmworks (Sentai). Since its founding, Sentai provides thousands of hours of content across traditional and digital platforms. Sentai’s dedication to bringing captivating stories, including acclaimed titles such as Grave of the Fireflies, Ninja Scroll, and High School of the Dead to audiences, is ongoing.

Ledford’s most recent success is with the 2017 founding of the streaming service HIDIVE. Since launching, HIDIVE is now available via a web browser, mobile devices, gaming platforms, and more. HIDIVE offers new simulcasts every season, an ever-growing collection of dubs, and exclusive titles. The service features DUBCAST SM editions, early access local-language dubs of simulcasts directly produced by HIDIVE, as early as two weeks after the original Japanese broadcast.

For nearly thirty years now, Ledford continues his goal to further the expansion of anime and the Japanese culture as a whole.
